string-array.name: main
string-array.item: Greetings! welcome to Walkly, mankind\'s last line of defense against the powers of laziness!
What? you want to know where the calorie-tracking is? Goodness me!
I don\'t think you understand the gravity of the situation at hand. What you\'ve gotten yourself into is bigger than the effect your brunch had on your love handles
You are to become a SAVIOUR OF HUMANITY. Well, sort of, anyway
